findings.quote: Correct wage impact calculation by taking mean wage to avoid double counting uncertainty
findings.issue: Comment claims to avoid double counting but still multiplies uncertain population by uncertain wage

findings.quote: Elasticity of work hours with respect to non-wage income
findings.issue: Definition contradicts later calculation which divides by total income not just non-wage income
Formula divides UBI by total income but elasticity is defined for non-wage income changes

findings.quote: Income effects are based on empirical studies of lottery winners and inheritance recipients
findings.issue: Claims studies inform income effects but model shows no evidence of calibration to specific studies

findings.quote: Administrative costs and funding mechanisms not considered
findings.issue: Model analyzes GDP impact without considering that UBI funding would also affect labor supply
